member.name: ISwapChainBackgroundPanelNative.SetSwapChain
member.summary: Sets the DirectX swap chain for SwapChainBackgroundPanel.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISwapChainBackgroundPanelNative
member.summary: Provides interoperation between XAML and a DirectX swap chain.
